bill.title: Pollution Protection Measures
bill.description: Concerning measures to protect communities from pollution, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Energy & Environment
House Committee on Energy & Environment Refer Amended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Transportation & Energy
Senate Committee on Transportation & Energy Refer Unamended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Unamended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Energy & Environment: Adopt amendment L.001
House Energy & Environment: Refer House Bill 23-1294, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1294 to the Committee on Energy & Environment.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1294, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Transportation & Energy: Refer House Bill 23-1294 to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1294 to the Committee of the Whole.
